price: (106) When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allāh?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
